projects.name: Pong!
projects.description: A minigame made using a 2D SDL engine.

projects.name: GPS System
projects.description: This system is made using the Dijkstra's algorithm. This is using nodes that are connected to each other, this calculates to closest node but also which direction you are going to calculate the shortest path to the destionation.

projects.name: ELS
projects.description: This system is a System based on the Emergency Lighting System, the rendering and looping is all Client sided but the whole server sees when a siren etc is enabled.

projects.name: FiveR - Hulpdiensten Nederland Bot
projects.description: Moderation, Utility, Custom advanced Features and a Database with MySQL.
